title: Paris 2024
author: Pol Gubau Amores
description:
Our solution to Linnaeus University, Sweden. We have chosen to create a thesis about the Paris 2024 Olympic Games based in Leadership and management.

Group thesis by Eléa de Lavallaz, Mathis Dufourmantelle, Pol Gubau Amores and Emma Ménard.

Coded and designed by Pol Gubau Amores as a challenge from Frontend Practice. Inspired by Backstage Talks.
Open Source code available on GitHub.

pages.title: The thesis
pages.content: A multi-Frame analysis of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games

pages.title: Content
pages.content: Based on the biggest sociologists and political economists such as Max Weber

pages.title: Available worldwide totally free
pages.content: Print the Thesis or read it on your computer, tablet or smartphone
